runic.research.FIRST_STEPS.title: Cryptic Beginnings
runic.research.FIRST_STEPS.stage.1:
Who would have thought that an enchanting table could have transformed a bit of stone into this amazing runed stone? The runed stone seems to hint on how I can use runes to my advantage.
I am not sure where to begin on the journey of learning the arts of runic magic. Maybe I should research how to create more powerful runes...
runic.research.UNLOCK_RUNES.stage.1:
To create stronger runes I am going to need some sort of forge and anvil. How ever any mundane anvil and furnace will simply not do.
I need to create some sort of magic infused furnace. Maybe I could use the runes I already have to provide magic?
What ever the case I should probably get to work...
